preferences.main_subtitle_text: A friendly reminder from your IT@IC team
preferences.paragraph1_text: A fully up-to-date device is required to ensure that IT can your accurately protect your computer.
preferences.paragraph2_text: If you do not update your computer, you may lose access to some items necessary for your day-to-day tasks.
preferences.paragraph3_text: To begin the update, simply click on the button below and follow the provided steps. To read more about upgrading your mac, click the More Info button
preferences.paragraph_title_text: An OS update is required on your Mac.
